summary: Build verification failed - TypeScript errors in widget and server packages

failures.actual: Multiple TypeScript errors in @ghost-greeter/widget package (52+ errors in test files)
failures.evidence: widget typecheck errors: Property 'style' does not exist on type 'Element', Object is possibly 'undefined', unused variable declarations, type conversion errors

failures.actual: Build failed in @ghost-greeter/server package with TypeScript errors
failures.evidence: server build errors: unused variables, type mismatches in test files, missing properties in mock types

recommendation: Dev agent needs to fix all TypeScript errors before QA can proceed. These are pre-existing test file issues that should have been caught during dev.
